node.text: System Reboot... Visuals Online. You wake up in a cryo-pod on the starship 'Void Runner'. Alarms are blaring. "Oxygen levels critical," the AI announces.
The bridge is in chaos. Sparks fly from the consoles. The captain is missing. You see a distress beacon blinking.
Engineering is filled with smoke. The reactor core is unstable. You spot a manual override lever and a coolant terminal.
Signal broadcasted. A nearby Federation cruiser responds. "Hold tight, we are docking." You are saved.
The logs show the ship was sabotaged. Suddenly, the airlock behind you opens. You are sucked into space.
You pull the lever. The reactor vents the excess heat into the hallway... where you are standing.
You bypass the security protocols and stabilize the core. The ship is safe, but you are drifting in deep space.
You climb back into the pod. "Wake me up when we get home," you whisper. Darkness takes you.
